metaTags.metaTitle: Under DDoS Attack? | Emergency DDoS Protection
metaTags.metaDescription: Website under attack? Our Anti-DDoS services defend against any form & size of enterprise level DDoS attack. Find out what anti DDoS measures we use to shield against attacks.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

marketoEmbeddedForm.bladeName: Under Attack Hotline Marketo Form (1639) Variation

relatedBlades.title: Under DDoS Attack?
relatedBlades.subtitle: Get immediate help to bring your website and network back online
relatedBlades.copy:
- __Fast onboarding:__ Measure deployment time in minutes and hours, not days or weeks. Our expert team is on standby to help bring your website and network back online immediately - __Unmetered robust DDoS protection:__ Over 280 Tbps of mitigation capacity ensures your website/ network remains online — regardless of the size or sophistication of the attack - __24/7/365 support:__ Our Enterprise plan customers get access to 24/7/365 support via chat, email, and phone for immediate help with customization or any issues

Cyber Emergency Hotline: +1 (866)-325-4810

relatedBlades.title: Activate DDoS Protection. Get These Benefits Within a Few Minutes
keyFeature: Protection against DDoS attacks of any size or kind
Mitigates both low-and-slow and volumetric attacks
24/7/365 support backed by our team of security experts
Threat intelligence harnessed from the network effect of millions of Internet properties on Cloudflare
Predictable, flat pricing regardless of attack size or duration
Anycast DNS and BGP based DDoS Protection
Integrated fast performance over the Cloudflare network

relatedBlades.quote: "Cloudflare has reliable infrastructure and an extremely competent and responsive team. They are well-positioned to deflect even the largest of attacks."

features.title: GigaOm
features.description: Cloudflare was named a Leader in the [2022 GigaOm Radar Report](https://www.cloudflare.com/gigaom-radar-ddos-protection/) for DDoS Protection (*1)

features.title: Gartner
features.description: Cloudflare has received the most number of 'High' ratings as compared to the other 6 DDoS vendors across 23 assessment criteria in Gartner's 2020 'Solution Comparison for DDoS Cloud Scrubbing Centers' [report](https://www.gartner.com/document/3983636)(*2)

features.title: Forrester
features.description: Cloudflare has been recognized as a "[Leader](https://www.cloudflare.com/forrester-wave-ddos-mitigation-2021/)" in 'The Forrester Wave: DDoS Mitigation Solutions, Q1, 2021' report(*3)
